package.name: ArcDPS Blish HUD Integration
package.description: This addon provides data from the Arcdps Combat API to the Blish HUD overlay, where it can be used by different Blish HUD modules for optimization and additional functionality.
package.tooltip: Uses the ArcDPS Combat API to provide data to Blish HUD

package.name: ArcDPS Boon Table
package.description: Displays squad boon uptime for a number of boons and includes information such as individual player boon uptime and their subsquad.

package.name: ArcDPS Buddy
package.description: Track combat information like casts, buffs, breakbar damage, condition transfers etc.

package.name: BuildPad
package.description:
A companion plugin to ArcDPS that allows you to organize a list of saved builds and copy them with one click.

It detects your ArcDPS templates and converts them (automatically and/or manually) to GW2 templates. Your old gear templates, which cannot be pasted into GW2, can be previewed inside the plugin so you can remind yourself which items and stats you had saved.

package.name: ArcDPS Clears
package.description: Adds a window for quickly checking your current weekly clears in the game.
package.tooltip: Check your weekly clears in the game

package.name: ArcDPS Food Reminder
package.description: Displays a reminder for your own Food/Utility item buffs. Adds an overview of Food & Utility item buffs on your Party/Squad and own characters.

package.name: ArcDPS Healing Stats
package.description:
Shows personal healing statistics based on your local stats (i.e. your own healing output).

This includes outgoing healing per target and per skill, as well as filtering to only include your own subgroup/squad and to exclude minions
package.tooltip: Shows statistics for personal healing done

package.name: ArcDPS Killproof.me Plugin
package.description: This addon shows the killproofs of players, that are registered on killproof.me

package.name: ArcDPS Mechanics Plugin
package.description: This addon shows mechanics that players have failed during a raid encounter. A list of the failed mechanics is displayed, including which player failed what mechanic and at what time during the fight.

package.name: ArcDPS Scrolling Combat Text
package.description: Adds a highly customizable scrolling combat text beside the users character. Incoming damage is by default displayed on the left side, outgoing damage on the right side.
package.tooltip: Shows all damage numbers as a highly customizable wall of scrolling text.

package.name: ArcDPS Squad Ready Plugin
package.description:
Plays audio notifications when a squad ready check is started and completed.

The ArcDPS Unofficial Extras plugin is required to be installed to function correctly.

package.name: ArcDPS Unofficial Extras
package.description:
This plugin provides additional information to other plugins. For example, it enables the killproof.me addon to display players who are not in the same instance.

It also has some small features by itself, such as mouse clipping, which prevents accidentally interacting with things while panning the camera
package.tooltip: Additional features for arcdps and plugins

package.name: ArcDPS uploader
package.description: This is an extension for Arcdps that allows you to preview and upload EVTC combat logs in-game
package.tooltip: Preview and upload EVTC combat logs in-game by datatobridge

package.name: ArcDPS
package.description: ArcDPS allows the player to view their DPS and offers other tools like FPS and ping metrics. By default, this menu can be made visible in-game with the keybind alt+shift+h. For more information, click the link above to visit the website.

package.name: DRF
package.description: Gw2 Drop Research Facilities is the ultimate loot tracking tool for Guild Wars 2. Using the Website or the BlishHUD module, you can see and track farming sessions or manage bag openings live!

package.name: GW2 Radial
package.description: An ArenaNET-approved addon to show a convenient, customizable radial menu overlay to select a mount, novelty item and more, on the fly.
package.tooltip: Provides a menu with access to all unlocked mounts with one keypress
